column5: Hey guys , lately I've been catching mooneye alot in the Grand River , and i was talking to my neighboor about it and he was so shocked that i was catching them there, he also said people come from all over North America to catch mooneye in the river , and they're quite the tasty fish. Is this true ? any suggestions on how to cook em ?
Smoked, they are fantastic! If you don't have a smoker, get one!
